original_title: Hvernig á að vera Klassa Drusla
overview: Karen, an experienced country girl, comes to pick up her best friend Tanja, awkward in life and love. When Karen arrives to pick her up, Tanja is already outside throwing clothing at her now, once again, ex-boyfriend. The women head to the country side of Iceland where they intend to work on a farm for the summer as well as having some fun times of their own. Tanja is already upset and has her doubts about the trip but once they arrive at the farm she quickly falls for a handsome country boy named Ívar. However once her plans to seduce Ívar goes very very wrong she starts to admire how Karen makes it look so easy. Karen can basically do whatever she wants without care or consequences, no strings attached. So Tanja asks Karen to mentor her. To teach her how to become more carefree and open minded with hilarious consequences.
title: How to be a Classy Tramp
